title: Smooth Rotation
p: The following scripts provide smooth rotation scripts.
pre: define turn closer to (target direction) (smoothness) turn cw ((((((target direction) - (direction)) + (180)) mod (360)) - (180)) / (smoothness)) degrees
p: Set the (smoothness :: custom) variable to the amount of smoothness.
pre: define turn closer to (target direction) (smoothness) turn ccw (target direction) degrees turn cw ((target direction) - ((direction) / (smoothness))) degrees
p: This script behaves identically to the previous script.
pre: define turn closer to (target direction) (deg) set [angle change v] to (((((target direction) - (direction)) + (180)) mod (360)) - (180)) if <([abs v] of (angle change)) < (deg)> then point in direction (target direction) else turn cw ((deg) * ((angle change) / ([abs v] of (angle change)))) degrees
p: Set the (deg :: custom) variable to the maximum amount of degrees the sprite can turn after the script is run.
